column3: January 7]], [[2004]]) was a Dutch translator. She translated some of [[J.R.R. Tolkien
column4: Tolkien]]'s non-[[Middle-earth]] stories into Dutch and was the first to translate ''[[Smith of Wootton Major]]'' and ''[[Leaf by Niggle]]''. Among her other translations is the work of [[Vera Chapman]].

column1: * [[1968]]: ''De Smid van Groot-Wolding'' (''[[Smith of Wootton Major]]'')
